alert.note: Alert for Emanuel; Jefferson; Johnson; Laurens; Montgomery; Toombs; Treutlen; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 5:56AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Laurens, northwestern Toombs, Emanuel, Treutlen, southeastern Johnson, north central Wheeler, southeastern Jefferson and northern Montgomery Counties through 645 AM EDT... At 556 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Blundale to near Scott to Cadwell, and moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Swainsboro, Soperton, Vidalia, Twin City, Adrian, Stillmore, Cadwell, Oak Park, Garfield, Summertown, Nunez, Tarrytown, Kite, Lothair, Covena, Modoc, Canoochee, Rockledge, Norristown and Barnhill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Emanuel; Jefferson; Johnson; Laurens; Montgomery; Toombs; Treutlen; Wheeler
